short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the schedule for the Bay School of San Francisco.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension, when activated shows a popup of the bayclock.org tool, showing you a customizable school schedule. This extension is specifically built for students at The Bay School of San Francisco because the schedule is specifically for it. The extension lets you customize what information to show in the popup.
